burn.name: Mana Break
burn.description: Every attack has damage bonus equal to target's mana and makes the enemy discard a right hand skill card of that hero

buff.description: Damage increased by the target's mana and makes the enemy discard a right hand skill card of that hero

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Teleport AntiMage to the target spot

shield.name: Spell Shield
shield.description: Increases the resistance to magic attacks

ult.name: Mana Void
ult.description: Damage area over target with bonus damage equal the number of skill cards the enemy could have in his right hand. Interrupts target channel

slow.name: Crystal Nova
slow.description: A burst of damaging frost that slows enemies in the target area

buff.description: Slowed by a burst of damaging frost

aura.name: Arcane Aura
aura.description: Give a bonus skill card per turn to the player

buff.description: Player buys one extra skill card per turn

freeze.name: Frostbite
freeze.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Interrupts target channel

buff.description: Frozen (disarmed and rooted) and receiving damage over time

ult.name: Freezing Field
ult.description: Rylai channels a storm of icy explosions that deals damage to enemies around her

source.description: Let it go! Let it go!

targets.description: Slowed and damaged by icy explosions

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Channels light to damage enemies in a line

leak.name: Mana Leak
leak.description: Forces a right hand target skill discard on every move. Stuns if target has no more right hand skill cards

buff.description: Loses a right hand skill card everytime this unit moves

ult.name: Spirit Form
ult.description: Ezalor becomes one with the light! Gains Recall and Blinding Light skill cards

blind.name: Blinding Light
blind.description: Knock back and blind enemies, causing them to miss attacks

recall.name: Recall
recall.description: If unharmed after enemy turn, target is teleported to a free spot near Ezalor

summon.name: Summon Spirit Bear
summon.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear with Entangling claws and Demolish. Player gets one Return skill card

source.name: Demolish
source.description: Increases the power of the Spirit Bear, causing it to deal 4 extra damage to buildings

source.name: Entangling Claws
source.description: Attacks have a chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing 6 damage per second. Interrupts target channel

target.description: Rooted and receiving damage per second

bearreturn.name: Return
bearreturn.description: Teleports the Spirit Bear back to the Lone Druid. Player must discard if the bear is killed;

rabid.name: Rabid
rabid.description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear

roar.name: Savage Roar
roar.description: Roars causing enemies to flee in terror. Unit retreats one spot if the position is free. Interrupts targets channel

ult.name: True Form
ult.description: Lone Druid morphs himself into a raging bear with increased HP and armor. Also gains the Battle Cry skill card

cry.name: Battle Cry
cry.description: Increases the attack and armor of Syllabear and the Spirit Bear

stun.name: Impale
stun.description: Rock spikes burst along a straight path, hitted enemies are stunned and take damage

burn.name: Mana Burn
burn.description: Damages an enemy unit by 4X it's mana and makes enemy player lose a card of that hero

spike.name: Spiked Carapace
spike.description: Bonus armor, bonus resistance and reflects damage received, while stunning the source of damage

buff.description: Bonus armor, bonus resistance and reflects damage received, while stunning the source of damage

ult.name: Vendetta
ult.description: Nyx Assassin becomes invisible and gains bonus on next attack

hook.name: Meat Hook
hook.description: Launches a bloody hook that will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit to Pudge and dealing damage if enemy. Interrupts enemy channel

rot.name: Rot
rot.description: A toxic cloud that deals damage and slows enemies. Damage is dealt at the turn end, Pudge will also be damaged

passive.name: Flesh Heap
passive.description: Gives Pudge bonus HP and damage on every kill and reduces magic damage

buff.description: HP and attack increased per kill and bonus magic resistance

ult.name: Dismember
ult.description: Pudge chows down on an enemy, disabling and dealing damage over time. Interrupts target channel

target.description: Disabled and receiving damage over time

stun.name: Wraithfire Blast
stun.description: Damage and stun a target then slows and deals over time

lifesteal.name: Vampiric Aura
lifesteal.description: Every attack will drain a percentage of the enemy life

crit.name: Mortal Strike
crit.description: Wraith King attacks will have a chance of inflicting critical damage bonus

ult.name: Reincarnation
ult.description: Wraith King will come back to full HP on next player turn after being killed

source.description: No one can kill the Wraith King!

targets.description: Slowed by the return of the King!
